title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Comparative Analysis of Automated Essay Scoring Systems and Human Evaluation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental essay writing skills and digital assessment tool experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain consistency gaps by comparing scoring results between AI systems and human evaluators across three essay types (Argumentative, Analytical, Reflective)
Learners can identify five or more limitations of AI scoring systems (e.g., lack of contextual understanding, inadequate evaluation of subjective expressions) and propose improvements
Learners can design their own evaluation criteria and compare human evaluator and AI scoring results for 10 essay samples with over 80% accuracy
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
